title.rendered: Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken has acquired 100 per cent of the shares in Boye Advisory

content.rendered:
Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken AB (publ) (“SEB”) has acquired 100 per cent of the shares in Boye Advisory AB, one of the market-leading providers of non-financial services to Swedish business families.

Boye Advisory was founded in 2018 with the aim to support Swedish business families and individuals in managing their non-financial, administrative and lifestyle needs. The Stockholm-based company has established itself as a valued partner to several leading Swedish family businesses and owner families. The transaction will further strengthen SEB’s Private Wealth Management & Family Office division and enhance its offering to this client segment.

SEB is a leading northern European financial services group with a presence in more than 20 countries worldwide and approximately 18,000 employees. As of 30 June 2024, the Group’s total assets amounted to SEK 4,152 billion while assets under management totaled SEK 2,666 billion.

Mannheimer Swartling advised SEB in the transaction.
